parameters.query: SELECT vb.id, vb.brand_name, vb.risk_level, vb.vero_keywords, vb.image_hash_patterns FROM vero_brands vb WHERE vb.user_id = $1 OR vb.user_id IS NULL ORDER BY vb.risk_level DESC
INSERT INTO vero_check_logs (user_id, product_id, brand_checked, is_blocked, risk_level, image_processed, created_at) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6, NOW())
DELETE FROM vero_check_logs WHERE created_at < NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days'
